context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"ab4d13","name":"`video` element content is media alternative for text","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks non-streaming `video` is a media alternative for text on the page.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Language"],"acknowledgments":{"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}}
